attributes.action: learn the lesson of the RMT strike against Metronet and spread the tube maintenance contracts over more companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Londners can be held to ransom if TFL brings all the maintenance in house as the RMT union seems to want.  At least some lines were operating on September 4.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
